hero.badge: Smart DBT Solution for Social Justice
hero.description: Revolutionary Direct Benefit Transfer system for PCR & PoA Acts. Ensuring swift, transparent, and dignified assistance to victims of caste-based discrimination.

stats.impactSubtitle: Real-time statistics showcasing transparency and efficiency.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything You Need for Seamless DBT

footer.companyDesc: Empowering social justice through technology. Making Direct Benefit Transfer transparent, efficient, and accessible for all.
footer.developedBy: Developed under Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment, Government of India
